author: Claire Parker, Alex Horton, William Neff
title: What to know about the role Javelin antitank missiles could play in Ukraine’s fight against Russia
description: The Javelin has become symbolic of U.S. assistance and battlefield exploits. But it's not a silver bullet, experts say.
content: The Javelin has taken on a symbolic valence in pro-Ukraine online chatter. Former reporter Christian Borys created an image of a saint clutching a Javelin and its launch unit. The image on stickers a… [+14892 chars]
